tags.name: Simulations Information Service (NHIIS)
tags.description:
The Non Health Simulations Information Service offers the following services
  * Simulations Services - Servicios para crear, modificar, versionar y borrar simulaciones
  * Holder Services - Servicios para crear, modificar y borrar los tomadores de la poliza
  * Product Services - Servicios del producto
  * Assets Services - Bienes y riesgos. Insurance asset.
  * Quotation services - Gestión de los precios
  * Document Services - Documentación y operativa con documentos
  * Notification Services - Servicos para notificar y enviar la simulación por diferentes medios
  * Bulk Simulations Services - Servicios para crear y consultar lotes de simulaciones

simulationStatus.description:
Simulation status. The value is one of the following:
  - "pending" : simulation is pending compilation
  - "available": simulation is available
  - "deleted": simulation is terminated
  - "final": simulation saved
  - "blocked": simulation is blocked e.g. for legal reasons

documentStatus.description:
Document status. The value is one of the following:
  - "pending" : document simulation is pending compilation
  - "available": document simulation is available

coverageStatus.description:
Coverage status. The value is one of the following:
  - "selected" : coverage is selected
  - "unselected": coverage is inactive

clauseType.description:
Clause type. The value is one of the following:
  - "manual" : clause created by user
  - "automatic": clause linked to object

policySimulationStatus.description:
Policy status. The value is one of the following:
  - "imcomplete_assets" : more assets information is needed
  - "error_assets" :
  - "incomplete_coverages": more coverage information is needed
  - "error_coverages" :
  - "completed" :

notificationStatus.description:
Notification status. The value is one of the following:
  - "pending" : notification simulation is pending 
  - "completed": notification simulation is completed

bulkSimulationsStatus.description:
Bulk Simulations status. The value is one of the following:
  - "pending" : simulation is pending compilation
  - "available": simulation is available
  - "deleted": simulation is terminated
  - "blocked": simulation is blocked

userId.description: Id of the user who performed the action

amountValue.description:
The amount given with fractional digits, where fractions must be compliant to the currency definition. Up to 14 significant figures. Negative amounts are signed by minus. The decimal separator is a dot. **Example:** Valid representations for EUR with up to two decimals are:
  * 1056
  * 5768.2
  * -1.50
  * 5877.78

MessageCode400_QS.description: Message codes defined for AIS for HTTP Error code 400 (BAD_REQUEST).

MessageCode401_QS.description: Message codes defined for AIS for HTTP Error code 401 (UNAUTHORIZED).

MessageCode403_QS.description: Message codes defined for AIS for HTTP Error code 403 (FORBIDDEN).

MessageCode404_QS.description: Message codes defined for IS for HTTP Error code 404 (NOT FOUND).

MessageCode405_QS.description: Message codes defined for IS for HTTP Error code 405 (METHOD NOT ALLOWED).

MessageCode406_QS.description: Message codes defined for IS for HTTP Error code 406 (NOT ACCEPTABLE).

MessageCode429_QS.description: Message codes for HTTP Error code 429 (TOO MANY REQUESTS).

Error400_QS.description:
Standardised definition of reporting error information according to [RFC7807]
in case of a HTTP error code 400 for AIS.

type.description:
A URI reference [RFC3986] that identifies the problem type.
Remark For Future: These URI will be provided by NextGenPSD2 in future.

title.description:
Short human readable description of error type.
Could be in local language.
To be provided by ASPSPs.

detail.description:
Detailed human readable text specific to this instance of the error.
XPath might be used to point to the issue generating the error in addition.
Remark for Future: In future, a dedicated field might be introduced for the XPath.

additionalErrors.description:
Array of Error Information Blocks.

Might be used if more than one error is to be communicated

items.description: This is a data element to support the declaration of additional errors in the context of [RFC7807].

PSU-Device-ID.name: PSU-Device-ID
PSU-Device-ID.description:
UUID (Universally Unique Identifier) for a device, which is used by the PSU, if available.
UUID identifies either a device or a device dependant application installation.
In case of an installation identification this ID need to be unaltered until removal from device.
